bibl.bibl: Newport, George. 1848. On the anatomy and affinities of Pteronarcys regalis, Newm.: with a postscript, containing descriptions of some American Perlidæ, together with notes on their habits. [Read 2 May and 20 June 1848.] Transactions of the Linnean Society of London 20 (1846–51): 425–52.
